snippet: Kansas City scored four runs against Jacob deGrom in the fifth inning, and the Mets managed only two hits against Cueto, who pitched a complete game. Game 3 is set for Friday at Citi Field.
abstract: Kansas City Royals defeat New York Mets, 7-1, to lead World Series, 2-0.
lead_paragraph: Kansas City scored four runs against Jacob deGrom in the fifth inning, and the Mets managed only two hits against Cueto, who pitched a complete game. Game 3 is set for Friday at Citi Field.

headline.print_headline: A Gem, but Not by DeGrom
headline.main: World Series Gem by Johnny Cueto Helps Royals Rout Mets
